messages.title: STANDING UP FOR OUR LOCAL COMMUNITY
messages.content: The election is our chance to help create a fairer society here in Leeds and across the country. Your vote really matters.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Waiting lists for operations have risen under the Tories and there are not enough GPs. Labour will introduce free prescriptions for all and free personal care for older people, and as Labour has always done, we will give our NHS the money and support it needs.

Dangerous climate change is a threat to our children and grandchildren's future, but we can prevent it if we act now. Labour's Green Transformation Fund will invest in new solar, tidal and wind energy and in better-insulated homes to create hundreds of thousands of good jobs.

The Tories have denied Yorkshire its fair share of investment. Labour will change that. We will invest in new infrastructure like better transport and in tackling social deprivation. We'll raise the Living Wage to £10 an hour and provide free school meals for all primary age children.

issues.brexitEurope: I will vote to give the British people the final say on Brexit.
issues.defence: I will always stand up for the security of our country.
issues.environment: I will support action to tackle climate change.
issues.health: I will campaign to protect our precious NHS.

community.content: I have helped thousands of constituents and campaigned for Leeds to get better flood defences, improved public transport and more investment in our city.

leaflet.personalStatement: I see my job as standing up for you, listening to your concerns and then taking action. I have helped thousands of constituents and campaigned for Leeds to get better flood defences, improved public transport and more investment in our city. In Parliament I speak up for what I think is right, and I hope that's what you want in your MP.

contactInformation.address: Unity Business Centre, 26 Roundhay Road, Leeds LS7 1AB

endorsements.endorsement: I'm supporting Hilary because I have seen how hard he works for people in our area. He listens, he acts and above all he fights for Leeds Central. He is a dedicated and effective MP.

images.caption: Hilary Benn standing up for our local community.
